post:
Thank you for the wonderful year! It's been an honor to be a part of the community, and we hope to be posting again at 2 years into our membership here!
 
Connected via Level3, CenturyLink, Hurricane Electric, Verizon, Yipes, XO, Zayo, TWtelecom, and Comcast. Accept no less than the best. We are located in Denver, CO, with amazing network connectivity to all locations! If you are looking to have a low latency coast to coast application for the US, we are in a prime location with prime transit!

Here's our OpenVZ VPS plans being offered today!
<pre>
> 256 MB OpenVZ Virtualization,
> 256 MB Guaranteed RAM
> 256 MB vSwap
> 2 vCPU Cores
> 30 GB RAID Disk Space
> 250 GB Bandwidth
> 100 Mbps Port Speed
> 1 IPv4 Address
> /64 IPv6 Netblock
> SolusVM VPS Control Panel
> Location: Denver, CO
> US Based Support
> Templates: CentOS, Debian, Ubuntu 14.04 (32bit + 64bit versions)
> $3.00 per month (Quarterly $8.00) (Annual $25.00)

</pre>
